reporter_caption.center: DOUGHERTY v. MATERIAL HANDLING SUPPLY, INC., 584 Pa. 701 (2005)

caption.center: JOSEPH DOUGHERTY AND TRACY DOUGHERTY, Petitioners v. MATERIAL HANDLING
SUPPLY, INC. AND CROWN EQUIPMENT CORP., Respondents.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.posture: No. 268 EAL 2005, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 9th day of September, 2005, Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
